728915f-a.title: Richmond: Harbor Road - Richmond Terrace
728915f-a.text:
Harbor Road, west side, south from (No. 12) Richmond Terrace.
In the background is visible the Summerfield Methodist Episcopal
Whurch, near the Staten Island Railroad Tracks.
Aril 23, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728915f-a.folder: Harbor Road & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY

728916f-a.title: Richmond: Harbor Road - Richmond Terrace
728916f-a.text:
Harbor Road, wost side, south of Richmond Terrace,
showing a children's playground and the rears of houses
fronting on Lockman Avenue.
April 23, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728916f-a.folder: Harbor Road & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY

728910f-a.title: Richmond: Harbor Road - Richmond Terrace
728910f-a.text:
69 arbor Road, east side, between Richmond Terrace and
the Staten Island Railroad tracks. Beers's map of 1874, and
Robinson's maps of 1898 and 1907 show the house to have be-
longed to W.V.N. Post.
April 23, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
NO RIPRODUCTIONS.
728910f-a.folder: Harbor Road & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY

729450f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Harbor Road
729450f-a.text:
Richmond Terrace, at the N.E. corner of Harbor Road,
showing the Harbor Theatre in a state of disuse.
Arril 23, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIOS
